page.title: 20THOUGHTS ON LIFE IN 1985
page.content:
Compiled by junior aged children.
"We have a weekend off school on Saturday and Sunday. On these two days we can do almost anything we want to. During the day we could play "Space Invaders" on the home computer or have a game of football outside in the street with our friends. In the evening we mostly watch television." Chris Stone (aged 10 yrs)
"We start school at 8.55 a.m. During registration we are set an English or Maths exercise. Every day we do some English and Maths work. We also have P.E. and time to do project work. Some of us stay for school lunch, others bring sandwiches. School finishes at 3.30 p.m." Claire Lloyd Davies (aged 11 yrs)
